text: Gumgi mbari, mbe nza zɨri ndiv vun kuamkuagi. Mbe mbari nza zɨri mbevi. Mbe mbari, mbe nza zɨn mbav bunin nza nzuaim, mbe mbari, mbe harigi ntɨɨri phorga nzuav, khaŋ mbe nzuai, nza tɨvir vhuuiaŋ mbui. Mbe gumgi mbari, kha ndɨkndɨga mbui, nza bigi guiguigi gumgi ma. Mbe mba ndɨkndɨga mbui, nza maaŋ mbui fhuvara. Nza guigira buni guarira nzuai.
